data.name: MessageBoxTextAreYouSureYouWantToExit
data.value: Are you sure you want to exit?

data.name: ControlAlreadyAssigned
data.value: {0} is already assigned to {1}. Remove the original control?

data.name: ControlIsNotValid
data.value: The pressed key may not be assigned to controls.

data.name: DoYouWantToKeepTheseSettingsXSecondsRemaining
data.value: Do you want to keep these settings? {0} seconds remaining.

data.name: InvertMouseX_Tooltip
data.value: Inverting the mouse X axis will make the cursor horizontally move in the opposite direction of the mouse.

data.name: InvertMouseY_Tooltip
data.value: Inverting the mouse Y axis will make the cursor vertically move in the opposite direction of the mouse.

data.name: Joystick_Tooltip
data.value: Select which additional control input you wish to use.

data.name: JoystickSensitivity_Tooltip
data.value: Joystick sensitivity determines how much the joystick axis will move the character, etc.

data.name: JoystickExponent_Tooltip
data.value: Joystick precision affects how fast the value of the joystick's axis will increase.

data.name: JoystickDeadzone_Tooltip
data.value: Joystick deadzone is the area where the joystick produces no effect. This is particularly useful for joysticks that are old, damaged, or very inaccurate at low values.

data.name: MouseSensitivity_Tooltip
data.value: A low sensitivity value will make the mouse cursor move less compared to a high value.

data.name: SorryButSelectedSettingsAreNotSupportedByYourHardware
data.value: Sorry, but the settings you have chosen are not supported by your hardware.

data.name: ErrorNameTooLong
data.value: Name is too long (max 128 characters allowed)

data.name: ErrorNameTooShort
data.value: Name is too short (min 5 characters required)

data.name: WorldSettings_Description_GameModeSurvival
data.value: Play the game in survival mode. Prove to the world how great an engineer you are!

data.name: WorldSettings_OnlineModeToolTip
data.value: Selects the online mode for the world. Offline: Disables any network access, including Steam workshop. This setting cannot be changed while in-game. Private: Enables multiplayer but friends can only join if invited through the Steam Friends list. Friends: Enables multiplayer and allows only friends to join. Public: Enables multiplayer and allows all players to join.

data.name: MessageBoxTextAreYouSureYouWantToDeleteSave
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete '{0}'?

data.name: WorldSettings_Description_GameModeCreative
data.value: Play the game in creative mode. No restrictions, no progression, just you and the blocks.

data.name: WorldSettings_Description_GameModeCustom
data.value: Customize the game however you want it. This is where you go to play with mods.

data.name: MessageBoxTextDoYouWantToSaveYourProgress
data.value: Do you want to save your progress?

data.name: MessageBoxTextAreYouSureYouWantToQuickLoad
data.value: Are you sure you want to quick-load?

data.name: MessageBoxTextAreYouSureYouWantToQuickSave
data.value: Are you sure you want to quick-save?

data.name: NoPlaceToCreateGrid
data.value: There's no place to create a new block. Point your view to an empty space.

data.name: ScreenCubeBuilderHint
data.value: Hint: Drag an icon to a toolbar slot and activate by a numeric key

data.name: SomeWorldFilesCouldNotBeLoaded
data.value: One of the world/save files is corrupted and can't be loaded. See log for details.

data.name: WorldFileIsCorruptedAndCouldNotBeLoaded
data.value: There was an error loading your world. For more information, look at the log file.

data.name: WorldLoad_Error_IncompatibleMods
data.value: Some mods are not compatible with each other or the base game. Try removing any any recently added/updated mods.

data.name: ToolTipVideoOptionsVideoAdapter
data.value: Select a graphic adapter and/or a monitor. Changing the adapter requires restart of the game.

data.name: ToolTipVideoOptionsVideoMode
data.value: Select a screen resolution. We recommend using an aspect ratio compatible with your monitor. If the game doesn't run smoothly, decrease your screen resolution.

data.name: ToolTipVideoOptionsCaptureMouse
data.value: Whether the cursor should be captured by the game window (for Windowed and Fullscreen Window modes).

data.name: ToolTipVideoOptionsVerticalSync
data.value: The game will synchronize with the refresh rate of the monitor. We recommend to turn it off.

data.name: WorldNotSaved
data.value: World '{0}' failed to save. This can be caused by running out of memory or problems when writing files. Working on this world any longer may result in loss of progress. You can check log file to find out more about what caused this error.

data.name: NotificationMemoryOverload
data.value: Not enough memory to add new objects

data.name: BetterGCIsAvailable
data.value: We have detected a better graphics card in your computer than the one the game currently runs on. Please check your settings in display options. Restart the game after changing adapters.

data.name: MessageBoxModsMismatch
data.value: The following list of mods are not compatible with your game version. Would you like to load them anyway?

data.name: MessageBoxModsLoadAnyway
data.value: Loading the world with these mods may result in unpredictable behavior and the world may not load at all. Do you want to try loading the world anyway?

data.name: MessageBoxTextOpenBrowser
data.value: This will open {0} in your internet browser. The game will keep running. Do you want to continue?

data.name: MessageBoxTextNoSavedWorlds
data.value: There are no saved worlds yet. Please start by creating a new world.

data.name: ErrorNameAlreadyExists
data.value: Name is already used. Please choose a different name.

data.name: NotificationColorFormat
data.value: Press {0} or {1} to change color. Hold {2} to apply color. Hold {3} or {4} to increase brush size.

data.name: NotificationHideHintsInGameOptions
data.value: You can hide these hints in Game Options

data.name: NotificationScreenFormat
data.value: Press {0} to configure toolbar or create new objects

data.name: NotificationUnlimitedBuildingFormat
data.value: Press {0} to add block, press {1} to remove block. Hold {2} to build fast

data.name: ScreenCubeBuilderSubtitle

data.name: MessageBoxTextWorldPublishFailed

data.name: MessageBoxTextModPublished
data.value: Publish has been completed successfully. If you have Steam Overlay enabled, a page will open and you can edit attributes such as title, description or visibility (it is public by default).

data.name: MessageBoxTextModPublishFailed

data.name: ScreenOptionsGame_WorkerThreads_Tooltip

Number of enabled worker threads. More - faster game, slower system Less - slower game, faster system
CAUTION: Higher numbers might cause system instability.
GAME NEEDS TO BE RESTARTED TO TAKE EFFECT.

data.name: TooltipScreenGraphicsOptions_AnisotropicFiltering
data.value: A higher level of filtering increases the quality of texture rendering.

data.name: TooltipScreenGraphicsOptions_AntiAliasing
data.value: Choose an anti-aliasing method to smooth jagged edges and textures.

data.value: Choose a preset for faster configuration of settings or to use as a starting point.

data.value: Choose the general quality of models in the game.

data.name: TooltipScreenGraphicsOptions_TerrainLodQuality
data.value: Choose the general level of detail for terrain. Lower settings improve performance.

data.name: TooltipScreenGraphicsOptions_ShadingQuality
data.value: Choose the general shading quality of objects in the game.

data.name: TooltipEnableVoiceChat
data.value: Enables in-game voice chat. Chat is proximity based, meaning the closer you are to another player the louder your voice will sound. Press F3 in multiplayer games to control player muting.

data.name: TooltipWorldSettings_VegetationDistance
data.value: Set the maximum distance to render grass, trees, bushes and other vegetation.

data.name: TooltipWorldSettings_GrassDensity
data.value: Choose a value for the density of grass. Grass density and foliage detail must both be enabled for grass.

data.name: MessageBoxTextGuideQuestion
data.value: Do you want to start by watching the video tutorial? Remember: you can always come back by clicking "Tutorials" in the "Help" screen (press F1).

data.name: NotificationIncompleteGrid
data.value: You can place only completely constructed and undamaged blocks in the inventory

data.name: MultiplayerErrorSessionEnded
data.value: The game session has ended. Feel free to join another one.

data.name: MessageBoxErrorFactionsTag
data.value: House tag must be exactly 3 characters long.

data.value: Mute the game sound when another window has focus.

data.name: NotificationResearchUnlocked

data.value: Download selected world to save games without loading it (Use to Edit Settings before playing world)

data.value: Note: Not all screens support skin at the moment

data.name: TooltipAnimatedRotation
data.value: Whether 90 degree block rotation will be animated.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettings_MaxBackupSaves
data.value: Configure the maximum number of saves that should be backed up. The backup folder is located in the respective save folder. When this is set to 0 the backup feature is disabled and all existing backups are deleted!

data.name: PerformanceWarningHeading
data.value: PERFORMANCE WARNINGS Press Ctrl + {0} for more info

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaAIDescription
data.value: Updating AI and pathfinding. Turn off cyberhounds and spiders.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaBlocksDescription
data.value: Update of individual blocks. Too many blocks in the world.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaClearAndGeometryRenderDescription
data.value: Rendering world geometry. Lower your voxel quality.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaConveyorDescription
data.value: Update of conveyors. Too many conveyors or blocks using conveyors in the world.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaGridDescription
data.value: Updating of ship systems other than oxygen, gyroscopes and conveyors.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaGyroDescription
data.value: Update of gyroscope systems. Too many gyroscopes in the world.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaLightsDescription
data.value: Rendering lights. Too many artificial lights in the world.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaOxygenDescription
data.value: Update of oxygen systems. Too many or too large pressurized areas.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaPhysicsDescription
data.value: Update of physics. Too many individual objects interacting with each other.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaRenderFoliageDescription
data.value: Rendering foliage (grass). Lower your foliage settings.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaScriptsDescription
data.value: Executing programmable blocks' scripts. Too many or too complicated scripts.

data.name: PerformanceWarningAreaShadowsDescription
data.value: Rendering shadows. Lower your shadow quality.

data.name: MessageBoxTextConfirmAcceptTransferGrid
data.value: Player {0} is transfering ownership of {1} blocks in ship {2} to you. Do you accept?

data.name: MessageBoxTextConfirmDeleteGrid
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete all your blocks from {0}? The ship may fall apart.

data.name: MessageBoxTextConfirmTransferGrid
data.value: Are you sure you want to transfer ownership of your blocks from {0} to player {1}?

data.name: MessageBoxTextNotEnoughFreeBlocksForTransfer
data.value: Player {0} does not have enough free blocks to accept your part of the ship

data.name: MessageBoxTextBlockLimitDisableWarning
data.value: Block limits are set to ensure good performance. Please disable this option only for experimental purposes.

data.name: PerformanceWarningTooManyBlocks
data.value: Too many blocks of this type.

data.name: LowMemSwitchToLowQuestion
data.value: Your game ran out of memory. Do you want to switch to low presets and restart the game to apply changes?

data.name: Inventory_NoSpaceForDrop
data.value: There is no room to drop that item.

data.name: StartupWarning_OldDrivers
data.value:
{0} - Warning!
Your '{1}' graphics card driver is older then required.
We strongly recommend updating the driver. Old drivers might crash the game. Would you like to update the driver?
Yes - Opens a browser to {2} No - Do not display this message again. Cancel - Close this message for now.
Thank You! Keen Software House

data.name: NotificationInventoryConstraint
data.value: The item cannot be put into this inventory.

data.name: NotificationInventoryFullParam
data.value: {0} cannot be put into {1}, the inventory is full.

data.name: MultiplayerLobbyError_Banned
data.value: You have been banned or blocked from the lobby.

data.name: MultiplayerLobbyError_BlockedMember
data.value: A member you blocked is already in the lobby.

data.name: GDPR_Message
data.value:
Data protection laws have changed in the European Union and we want to make sure you review how your personal data is processed in Medieval Engineers. [{0} You can read our privacy policy here].
By clicking Yes you agree to the collection of anonymized data for the purpose of improving the game experience. You can change your mind at any time by going to Options -> Game, and changing "Anonymous Activity Tracking".

data.name: GDPR_Options_Tracking_Tooltip
data.value: By checking this box you agree to the collection of anonymized data for the purpose of improving the game experience.

data.name: InputDialogError_Parsing
data.value: Given amount is not a valid number.

data.name: ConsumableItem_NotHungryEnough
data.value: You are not hungry enough to eat {0}.

data.name: LoadingError_WorldVersionTooOld
data.value: The world was saved in version {0} which is older than {1} and is no longer supported. For backwards compatibility reasons we provide the old version in Steam, please switch to the {2} branch, then load and re-save your world there.

data.name: MessageBoxTextNetworkInterruption
data.value: The network connection was interrupted. The world must be reloaded.

data.name: MultiplayerError_RenderSettingMismatch
data.value: Server requires a {0} higher than what is set in your graphics options. Server setting: {2}; Your setting: {1}

data.name: Settings_Graphics_VegetationDistance_Custom_Tooltip
data.value: Custom vegetation distance, enter a range between 0 and 5000.

data.name: Settings_Graphics_GrassDensity_Low_Tooltip
data.value: Thin spots of grass in the world.

data.name: Settings_Graphics_GrassDensity_Custom_Tooltip
data.value: Custom grass density, enter a range between 0 and 10.
